pull.title: doc: improve developer-notes about threads
pull.body: Document `i2paccept` in `doc/developer-notes.md` and fix broken URLs to doxygen.bitcoincore.org.

verification.payload:
tree b2ab09289594706f6233ec9decbb5c5a172ff966
parent bac52a1cfe9972fea563bad8a3c417a3db218c66
author Vasil Dimov <vd@FreeBSD.org> 1657199227 +0200
committer Vasil Dimov <vd@FreeBSD.org> 1657199227 +0200

doc: list the I2P accept thread in developer-notes

events.message: doc: list the I2P accept thread in developer-notes

events.body:
Code-review ACK 50d6d6f12d1494395945a6d94f5362beeced6c66

Checked that a description for the `i2paccept` thread was added, the ThreadMapPort thread name was corrected (s/`b-upnp`/`b-mapport`/) and verified that the doxygen links point to the right location.

verification.payload:
tree 23b9affb5c4dc709475c7c4975e0f2ebcfa48c67
parent c5cc3f140cb13bf933a9d1cb5333445b5d434940
author Vasil Dimov <vd@FreeBSD.org> 1657199913 +0200
committer Vasil Dimov <vd@FreeBSD.org> 1657526184 +0200

doc: update the URLs to thread functions in developer-notes

ThreadMapPort() does not appear on doxygen.bitcoincore.org
because it is inside `#ifdef`.

events.message:
doc: update the URLs to thread functions in developer-notes

ThreadMapPort() does not appear on doxygen.bitcoincore.org
because it is inside `#ifdef`.

events.body: `50d6d6f12d...dc02edcba1`: fix the name of the function for script validation: change `ThreadScriptCheck` to `CCheckQueue::Loop`.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -603,10 +603,10 @@ Threads
   : Started from `main()` in `bitcoind.cpp`. Responsible for starting up and
   shutting down the application.
 
-- [ThreadImport (`b-loadblk`)](https://doxygen.bitcoincore.org/init_8cpp.html#ae9e290a0e829ec0198518de2eda579d1)
+- [ThreadImport (`b-loadblk`)](https://doxygen.bitcoincore.org/namespacenode.html#ab4305679079866f0f420f7dbf278381d)
comments.body:
These URLs seem to be fragile. What about dropping them altogether and mentioning just the function name in the doc file.

In general, if it is not auto-generated from the source code then it will likely get outdated.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -603,10 +603,10 @@ Threads
   : Started from `main()` in `bitcoind.cpp`. Responsible for starting up and
   shutting down the application.
 
-- [ThreadImport (`b-loadblk`)](https://doxygen.bitcoincore.org/init_8cpp.html#ae9e290a0e829ec0198518de2eda579d1)
+- [ThreadImport (`b-loadblk`)](https://doxygen.bitcoincore.org/namespacenode.html#ab4305679079866f0f420f7dbf278381d)
comments.body: if [this](https://stackoverflow.com/a/10631357/5800072) is still true, links are based on the function signature, and those functions have indeed change since the last edit on this doc.

@@ -603,10 +603,10 @@ Threads
   : Started from `main()` in `bitcoind.cpp`. Responsible for starting up and
   shutting down the application.
 
-- [ThreadImport (`b-loadblk`)](https://doxygen.bitcoincore.org/init_8cpp.html#ae9e290a0e829ec0198518de2eda579d1)

comments.body: ok, so keeping it as is then

@@ -603,10 +603,10 @@ Threads
   : Started from `main()` in `bitcoind.cpp`. Responsible for starting up and
   shutting down the application.
 
-- [ThreadImport (`b-loadblk`)](https://doxygen.bitcoincore.org/init_8cpp.html#ae9e290a0e829ec0198518de2eda579d1)

comments.body: nit: the name `ThreadScriptCheck` doesn't exist anymore in the code-base, should this be just changed to `Loop` (though this is not very expressive)?
